channel.title: News 1 on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in News 1 on TechnoStreet

item.title: Is Aave Companies’ latest acquisition an attempt to boost AAVE’s price action
item.description: Is Aave Companies’ latest acquisition an attempt to boost AAVE’s price action Aave Companies confirmed the acquisition of Sonar, a Web3 social gaming application AAVE’s price continued to decline and remained significantly unprofitable Aave Companies, the developers of DeFi protocol Aave and decentralized social network Lens Protocol, announced the acquisition of web3 social gaming application Sonar on 5 December.

item.title: Polygon (MATIC) Price Prediction 2025-2030: Read it if you are HODLing MATIC in your portfolio
item.description: Polygon (MATIC) Price Prediction 2025-2030: Read it if you are HODLing MATIC in your portfolio Disclaimer: The datasets shared in the following article have been compiled from a set of online resources and do not reflect AMBCrypto’s own research on the subject Polygon, the blockchain firm behind the world’s 10th largest cryptocurrency MATIC, has been making considerable progress on its corporate front.

item.title: How a new update might just save Polygon’s declining dApp activity
item.description: How a new update might just save Polygon’s declining dApp activity Polygon’s MATIC is now ranked 11th in terms of market cap, with the altcoin having garnered a lot of interest due to its increasing number of collaborations.

item.title: What of Bitcoin [BTC] when things start getting ‘difficult’
item.description: What of Bitcoin [BTC] when things start getting ‘difficult’ Bitcoin mining has been subject to a lot of controversies of late.

item.title: Can Reddit NFTs’ launch have a positive impact on Polygon’s growth?
item.description: Can Reddit NFTs’ launch have a positive impact on Polygon’s growth?

item.title: Why you should read this before going all in on Tron [TRX]
item.description: Why you should read this before going all in on Tron [TRX] Tron [TRX], the cryptocurrency currently ranked 14th in terms of market cap, was in the news recently for its collaboration with the Dominican government.

item.title: EOS’s presence around this liquidity pocket will keep these parties interested
